title: Carbon Methodology & Decarbonization Specialist (f/m/x)
content:
Become part of Tanso and leverage your sustainability expertise for industrial emission reduction.
Join our team to take an active role in helping companies to decarbonize effectively and start your sustainability career in a fast-growing environment. Your main objective is to ensure compliance, consistency and scientific rigorousness in our calculation processes. Your main objective is to ensure compliance, development of consistent and scalable carbon accounting methodologies to calculate the emissions of our customers from the manufacturing industry.
As our Carbon Methodology & Decarbonization Specialist, you help us build and continuously improve our emissions measurement processes, together with our CPO and the Climate Intelligence team. Your focus will be carrying out research and analyses in environmental analysis and decarbonization and represent Tanso in expert groups and institutions.

Whom you will be working with

Gyri, CPO & Founder

Christoph, Product Manager
Customer Success Team

Recruitment Process

Culture & Personal Fit with Saskia - get to know Tanso and ask all your questions
Role Introduction with Gyri - understand your role and see who you will be working with
Deep Dive with Gyri & Vignesh - showcast your deep understanding of carbon accounting and methodologies
Team Lunch & Founder Interview

Job Requirements
P.S.: You're wondering why there isn't a list of concrete skill requirements in the job description? We believe it's more important that you are excited about the role and want to grow with it, instead of fulfilling some specific high-level requirements. We think there can be numerous different paths that could qualify you for this role, and we want to hear YOUR story.
However, to ensure we can communicate effectively with our customers, your language proficiency in German should be at least level B2 or higher, and to communication effectively within Tanso, your language proficiency in English should be at least level B2 or higher.
